articles.title: COVID-19 cases, deaths in the Americas triple in 2021 - P.M. News
articles.description: PAHO describes the year 2021 as “undoubtedly worse” for the Americas, where infections, deaths tripled compared to the first year of covid-19
articles.content:
By Cecilia Ologunagba/NAN
Pan American Health Organization (PAHO) – the regional office of the World Health Organisation (WHO)- has described the year 2021 as undoubtedly worse for the Americas, whe… [+3817 chars]

articles.author: Matthew Knott
articles.title: Democrat royalty: ‘Sweet Caroline’ Kennedy headed to Australia - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: As a member of one of America’s most storied political dynasties, JFK’s daughter should bring gravitas and glamour to the role of US ambassador.
articles.content: Kennedy was born in 1957, three years before her father was elected president, and spent some of her most formative years in the White House. Aged five, she appeared on the cover of LIFE magazine rid… [+3403 chars]
